definition: Suzhou embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4], 粵繡|粤绣[Yue4 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州

sentences.english: Suzhou Embroidery is famous for its extremely delicate stitches.
sentences.chinese: 蘇繡以其精美的繡品而聞名。

sentences.english: Su embroidery is famous for its delicate workmanship, beautiful designs, and tasteful colors.
sentences.chinese: 蘇繡因其工藝精細，構圖和色彩美麗高雅而聞名。

sentences.english: With a history of more than 3, 000 years, Su embroidery is the general name for embroidery products in areas around Suzhou, Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 蘇繡是以江蘇蘇州爲中心的刺繡產品的總稱。

sentences.english: Weaving methods have climbed from 18 to the present 40.
sentences.chinese: 蘇繡的針法由原來的18種發展到今天的40餘種。

sentences.english: It's a typical product of Suzhou embroidery.
Among Chinese hand embroidery , suzhou embroidery is considered the best one.
sentences.chinese: 在中國的手繡之中，蘇繡被以爲是最好的一種。

sentences.english: In history, Su Embroidery dominated the royal wardrobe and walls.
sentences.chinese: 在歷史上，蘇繡爲主的皇家衣櫃和牆壁。

sentences.english: In Western countries, embroidery more China, which is "Pearl of the Orient" in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在西方國家，蘇繡更有中國之“東方明珠”的美譽。

sentences.english: Ming and Qing Dynasties, embroidery and tea, porcelain export huge quantities of the West.
sentences.chinese: 明清時期，蘇繡與茶葉，瓷器大量出口西方。

definition: Guangdong embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3

definition: freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
Giuseppe Castiglione (1688-1766) Jesuit who served as Qing court painter for 50 years
unprecedented and never to be duplicated/the first and the last/unmatched/unique
